2056600.name: Tales of Agaris - Children of Fate
2056600.description:
One more additional content for Tales of Ágaris..

In Children of Fate you'll control Elliot at just 12 years old, without even having any intentions of becoming someone who would handle a sword.
The place is the village of Zahul, hometown of Elliot and his family. This game takes place a few years before the events of Tales of Agaris, so all cities are already present in this DLC.


The differential is the OPEN WORLD. You are free to walk beyond your main destination, primordial journeys will be parallel to phenomenal possibilities to interact and change the course of things, however, knowing that the final story will always be the one we know in Tales of Agaris.


The battle system is in real-time action, ABS. With possibilities to use the sword once you acquire it on anything the player sees. Whether an NPC or any other being. But being careful here is essential. The battles are hard and you will need mouse skill, both to escape and to attack.

Characters like Louis, Lars, Dereck and Kary will be present in this DLC, telling what happened on each moment in Tales of Agaris to happen a few years later, going deeper into their history.

Be on the lookout for more information soon.
